body.name: T-fal Initiatives Ceramic Nonstick Fry Pan Set 8.5, 10.5 Inch Oven Safe 350F Cookware, Pots and Pans, Grey
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: Healthy cooking, reduced eco impact: Crafted with 100% recycled aluminum body and a ceramic cookware nonstick interior for easy release, so you can enjoy healthy and delicious meals prepared with little to no oil.

Our 2 piece set includes a 7.5 inch and 10 inch Frypans ideal for for browning, searing, and pan-frying foods like eggs, vegetables, and meats, making this Frypan set the perfect addition to your kitchen!

Thermo-Spot Technology: Our unique heat indicator that turns solid red when the ceramic pans are properly pre-heated. Additionally, this kitchen cookware has an even heat base, preventing hot spots for safe reliable cooking results.

Stylish and Practical Design: Add a touch of color and style to your kitchen with this ceramic cookware. Featuring comfortable handles for a sturdy and secure grip on pots and pans, and vented glass lids for visibility that retains heat and moisture.

Effortless Cooking and Easy Cleanup: Compatible with all cooktops excluding induction and is oven safe up to 350°F, allowing you to prepare a variety of meals. Hand wash is recommended. Limited lifetime warranty.
body.description: T-fal Initiatives Ceramic cookware has a new and beautiful grey cooking surface and makes it easier than ever to cook healthier, nutritious, and delicious meals at home. The cookware’s heavy-gauge aluminum construction and even heat base offer durable strength, efficient cooking, and even heat distribution for reliably consistent results. Recyclable and PTFE-, PFOA-, and Cadmium-free. The cookware’s innovative grey ceramic nonstick interior provides easy food release with just a little oil and can handle high cooking-surface temperatures up to 570°F—perfect for searing meat, fish, poultry, and more to delicious perfection. Ergonomically designed heat resistant handles provide a comfortable and secure grip and are oven safe to 350°F (use an oven mitt), while vented, tempered-glass lids offer at-a-glance monitoring. Handwashing is recommended. With its high gloss exterior and beautiful grey interior, T-fal Initiatives Ceramic cookware pots and pans set makes a great gift idea for newlyweds, new homeowners, or anyone looking for a durable and stylish collection.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features Soft Touch Handles The T-Fal Titanium Advanced cookware set has riveted soft touch handles that are ergonomically designed for a comfortable and safe grip. Handles are oven safe up to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. Thermo-Spot Proper preheating to seal in food's flavor is a breeze with the patented T-fal Thermo-Spot, which clearly indicates when the pan has reached the optimal temperature to begin cooking. Titanium Advanced Nonstick Interior A special process creates a non-stick cooking surface reinforced with Titanium for the ultimate durability and longest lasting performance. The Titanium Advanced nonstick interior provides amazing food release and removes the fear of using metal utensils while cooking in non-stick pans.

Ideas You Can't Live Without Present in 120 countries, T-fal's mission is to offer ingenious products to make cooking simpler and more rewarding as well as making ironing easier and faster. T-fal is dedicated to understanding the consumer's needs and bringing innovative solutions. T-fal's history is marked with world-class innovations.

Features and Benefits Hard Anodized Construction Heavy gauge Hard Anodized aluminum with Titanium reinforced nonstick interior for frying, sautéing and browning Thermo-Spot Technology T-fal exclusive indicator shows when the pan is perfectly preheated and ready to begin cooking Dishwasher Safe Easy to clean cookware; safe for dishwasher use Riveted Silicone Handles Designed for comfort and safety; oven safe up to 400°F

About T-fal For more than 60 years, T-fal has aspired to make the lives of busy home cooks easier by providing ingenious, high-performing and user-friendly cookware that enables a shortcut to desired results, every time.It all started with a simple idea: a non-stick pan that would revolutionize food preparation, transfer and clean up -- allowing you to spend more time enjoying little moments with those you love.Today, as the industry leader in non-stick cookware, T-fal continuously strives to develop innovative product solutions that remove the guesswork and stress in the kitchen – such as T-fal Thermo-Spot - the unique heat indicator technology that shows when the pan is perfectly preheated and ready to begin cooking.T-fal is part of the Groupe SEB global family of brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have all-clad and le cruset pots and pans. No pan is as good as these. Tfal hit it right. Distributes heat evenly. Cooks well and weight of pans is right. And the best is the cleanup. Like no work at all. Light soap and paper towel to wipe clean. These have quickly become go to pans! Buy and enjoy. Will be purchasing more pots and pans with this cooking surface. A home run tfal - good show!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Cooking, mostly eggs and pancakes, unfortunately food will stick to the pans and started showing discoloration, I have been using T-Fall si se it came out, and loved it unfortunately this particular set was sooo bad from the beginning!!! I have been very displease about it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Brand name set at an excellent price.Non stick as advertised. Even heating with no hot spots. Dishwasher safe.Perfect for egg pans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Like this brand. A replacement as the prior purchase of another product did not last very long—about one year before ceramic ceased working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pan ever
reviews.reviewText: I like these so much, I bought 2 sets. One set went to my 89 year old aunt, who was complaining about food sticking to pans. These pans are really non stick. Cooking is a joy. Perfect for frying because of the heat temperature feature. You always know when the pan if ready to cook. Love t fal innovations

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars THSES PANS ARE COMPLETE GARBAGE AND THATS WHERE THEY BELONG.
reviews.reviewText: These pans are complete garbage and should be in the garbage can. I ordered these T-Fal frying pans because of their reputation for making good quality and I have one of their frying pans from over 10 years ago when they still had decent quality. These pans are flimsy and thin and have the weight and feel of cheap Chinese made junk from your local dollar store.Their new generation of these pans are a big disappointment. They were initially non stick the first 3 or 4 times then after that food started to stick and cleanup was not so easy. The handles on both of them started to come loose after only 2 weeks.This can be quite dangerous because when the handles get too loose the pan can flip upside down spilling hot food, cooking oil or grease all over someone causing severe burns or a fire. I have read some of these complaints on line and of a kitchen stove that was destroyed in a fire because of a loose handle.I tried to tighten up the handles with the screw under the handle and it is not a screw head that fits any kind of screwdriver that the average person would have. Its not a Phillips head or flat screw, just a weird kind of screw head I have never seen. I called T-Fal and they were no help at all except to say send it back ,, and I would have to pay shipping. The least they could do is email a shipping label .The pans are going back to Amazon for a refund. It is wishful thinking in many cases to expect good quality to come out of China. These pans were obviously made of substandard quality materials and I am not sure I even trust the claim by T-Fal that they are actually PTFE-PFOA Cadmium free.I guess you get what you pay for. Nothing good is cheap and nothing cheap is good. I will have to maybe spend double the money to get something of better quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good Cookware- But Wears Out Faster than Expected
reviews.reviewText: I intentionally waited a few months after buying these to see how they stood up- and they've done pretty well. I cook 3-4 times a day with each of these pans so they get very heavy usage, and I did properly "season them" every few weeks as recommended. With that said, here's my review-The Pros- Of all the pans I have in my kitchen, I enjoy cooking with these the most. They're mostly non-stick as advertised and it's easier to clean a bright white pan because you can clearly see everything. They also cook evenly so that's a big plus.The Cons- After about 6-8 weeks of heavy use (which would be the average person's six months), I'll have a dark residue left over in the pan that does not seem to wash out. It's almost like the olive oil penetrated the outer layers of the ceramic? Maybe, I don't know. But once that started a few days ago, these pans turn black immediately after adding heat to them and any oil/butter/base. Food easily sticks as well.Overall- At first I loved these pans and I really hoped that the negative reviewers just didn't take care of their cookware as instructed. I did everything right though and they now stick every time, so I'm pretty disappointed. I am going to order another set of ceramic pans but it will not be this brand...I'm crossing my fingers that I have better luck next time.However, I have cooked close to 150 meals in each of these pans and for the price- it's really hard to complain. As I said earlier, I cook 3-4 meals per day as a work from home dad and these pans were wonderful at the start. If I would have seasoned them weekly then they may still be perfect, so it's hard to complain about $17 for this mini-set. For the occasional cook, they'll last you years if you take care of them and that's a great bargain.One final thought- I always wash my pans 3-5 minutes after coming off the burner, and my sticking problem started when my wife left these sitting dirty overnight. So take my 3-star review with a grain of salt if you're a clean-a-phobe like me and take care of your stuff...I think these will do just fine for you as long as you season them regularly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Treat it nicely & all will be good
reviews.reviewText: I waited a month to do a review. I really like this cookware. I was skeptical because of pricing. I followed instructions before 1st use and oiled down the pans. I have never cooked on high with these and have never had an issue with food sticking. Most of the time to clean I wipe them out with a paper towel and put them away. If I have to wash with dish detergent or have cooked with acidic foods, I will wash then reapply a little oil before putting away. I have never put in the dishwasher as that is just too much for most skillets anyways. However, I do have 1 complaint. The paint on the bottom started chipping away after the 1st use on both pans. I have a new glass top stove, so I know I wasn't rough on it as I was not scooting the pan around. It does not affect the cooking, but it should have stayed on longer!
Perfect set of t-fal pans. I put them in the dishwasher and they look like new. Size of small one is great for one serving

ACTUALIZACION HOY 03/01/2021: SIGUEN EN EXCELENTE ESTADO Y DESPUES DE MÁS DE 6 meses DE USO NO SE LES PEGA NADA USANDO PAM 🙂 Pues ahí va mi reseña después de un mes cocinando con ambos TODOS LOS DÍAS INCLUYENDO SÁBADO Y DOMINGO. Llegaron en excelente estado, y lo primero que hice fue curarlos con aceite de oliva. Desde el primer día no se les pega absolutamente nada, OBVIAMENTE SÍ les tienes que poner algo de aceite, en mi caso use aceite de canola en aerosol. He preparado huevos, proteína como el pescado del video, carne 🥩, pechugas de pollo y como verán no se les pega nada, NADA. Los lavo todos los días con la ESPONJA amarilla de la marca Scotch Brite y detergente líquido. Repito: NO SE LE PEGA NADA siempre y cuando añadas poco aceite en aerosol en todo el sartén y permitas que se caliente lo suficiente. Buena compra y muy buen producto para cocinar DIARIO. El chiste es aprender a usarlo y lavarlo sin rayar nada.
It is sticky n food burnt fast, oil become charred fast, kinda regretted to buy this pans
